requirements.name: node
requirements.install_instructions: Install Node from https://nodejs.org/en/download/ or use Chocolatey: choco install nodejs
requirements.upgrade_instructions: Download newer Node from the official site or use Chocolatey: choco upgrade nodejs

requirements.name: python
requirements.install_instructions: Download Python from https://www.python.org/downloads/ or use Windows Store.
requirements.upgrade_instructions: Download newer Python from python.org or use your preferred method.
